source_objects.title: Digital Marketing
source_objects.description: Advance your digital marketing skills with great courses that teach you digital marketing strategy and tactics.

items.title: Build a highly persuasive Landing page in 2 hours & 0 coding
items.headline: Create and design highly converting landing pages. Build an optimized Landing Page with 0 coding from scratch.
objectives_summary: Understand what is "landing page" and why it is important for your business
Learn how to become a "Monster of Persuasion and manipulation"
Know how to make your landing page highly persuasive to enhance your conversion

items.title: Paid Traffic: Best Sources for INSTANT Targeted Traffic
items.headline: Learn the Secrets Most Internet Marketers Will Never Know About Paid Traffic and How You Can Profit from Massive Traffic
objectives_summary: Setup campaigns and let your ads reach 1000s of people
Know the major traffic sources that internet marketers use
Take charge of your advertising efforts and get more targeted leads

items.title: Hotjar Hero Masterclass
items.headline: Understand your Customer. Grow your Business. Take a Masterclass in Hotjar Analytics.
objectives_summary: Use and leverage the entire Hotjar software suit. No tool is left uncovered!
Increase your understanding of your website visitors and customers.
Grow your business by removing roadblocks in your websites design and interface.

items.title: Learn Google Tag Manager 2018: Crash Course
items.headline: Learn how to make data-driven business decisions, analyze relevant insights, and improve your customers experience
objectives_summary: Learn exactly what Google Tag Manager (GTM) is and how to use its features to manage and simplify tag implementation for Marketers, Analysts and Developers;
Manage multiple analytics and marketing tags from a single dashboard with (almost) no help from a developer;
Setup a GTM Account;

items.title: Klaviyo Mastery 1.0
items.headline: Learn how to use KLAVIYO. The best email marketing tool for e-commerce
objectives_summary: Learn how to setup Klaviyo
Learn how to create fundamental flows in Klaviyo
Learn how to use flow triggers

items.headline: A Mailchimp Course to get you up and running with Mailchimp. A Mailchimp Tutorial for beginners.

You will learn about Groups and Segmentation

items.title: Learn Digital Marketing For Beginners

objectives_summary: Learn everything to kickstart your Digital Marketing career

items.title: TikTok Marketing & Advertising 101, TikTok for Your Business

objectives_summary: Understand How TikTok Works
How to Use TikTok Marketing for Your Business
Basic TikTok Skills to Get Started Today

items.title: Introduction to Influencer Marketing
items.headline: An overview of influencer marketing for brands, entrepreneurs and influencers who want to maximise this media channel
objectives_summary: Be fluent in the fundamentals of Influencer Marketing
Be able to formulate an effective influencer marketing strategy and roll out plan
Be aware of the typical use cases for influence marketing, including awareness, growth in your brand’s social capital, and sales

items.title: The Complete Marketing Funnel - From Planning To Execution
items.headline: UPDATED Checklist to your automated marketing machine: Sales funnel, landing page, email marketing, campaigns, research
objectives_summary: Find out the most important things of your market
Position yourself above your competitors
Know exactly where your ideal customers are

items.title: Write The Perfect Marketing Email With Me
items.headline: Together we will create a replicable and actionable framework to write EXTREMELY high converting marketing emails
objectives_summary: Use this efficient system which has sold $80 Million worth digital marketing products to create ALL their email copy
Increase their email open rate by 60% using the ABCS Technique
Increase their email click through rate using 9 different psychological triggers
